briefTitle: Assessment of the Anesthetic Effect on the Activity of Immune Cell in Patient With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Assessment of the Anesthetic Effect on the Activity of Immune Cell in Patient With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: CD39 and CD73 on circulating regualtory T cells
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patient who was planned to undergo colon cancer surgery.

Exclusion Criteria:

* age \< 20 years old
* history of hypersensitivity reaction in propofol or sevoflurane
* history of previous cancer
* patient with ongoing inflammation
